value.title: YouTube is revamping its TV app to mimic paid streamers like Netflix, organizing videos by seasons and episodes, blurring the lines between pro and user content (Janko Roettgers/The Verge)
value.content:
Janko Roettgers / The Verge:
YouTube is revamping its TV app to mimic paid streamers like Netflix, organizing videos by seasons and episodes, blurring the lines between pro and user content  —  YouTube's TV app is starting to look a lot more like Netflix, further blurring the lines between traditional TV and creator shows.

value.title: Samsung says it's partnering with Nvidia to build an "AI Megafactory" and deploy over 50K of Nvidia's most advanced GPUs to embed AI in its chipmaking process (Mike Wheatley/SiliconANGLE)
value.content:
Mike Wheatley / SiliconANGLE:
Samsung says it's partnering with Nvidia to build an “AI Megafactory” and deploy over 50K of Nvidia's most advanced GPUs to embed AI in its chipmaking process  —  Samsung Electronic Co. Ltd. said today it's partnering with Nvidia Corp. to build an “AI Megafactory” …

value.title: Corporate travel and expense management software maker Navan's shares fell 20% to $20, valuing it at $5B, after raising $923.1M in its IPO at a $6.2B market cap (Subrat Patnaik/Bloomberg)
value.content:

Corporate travel and expense management software maker Navan's shares fell 20% to $20, valuing it at $5B, after raising $923.1M in its IPO at a $6.2B market cap  —  Navan Inc. shares slumped 20% after the business travel and expense management software maker and some of its shareholders raised $923.1 million …

value.title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy says the 14,000-person layoffs were due to "culture" and "removing layers" from its internal structure, not really AI or financial factors (Taylor Soper/GeekWire)
value.content:

Amazon CEO Andy Jassy says the 14,000-person layoffs were due to “culture” and “removing layers” from its internal structure, not really AI or financial factors  —  Amazon CEO Andy Jassy says the company's latest big round of layoffs — about 14,000 corporate jobs …

value.title: Cloudflare reports Q3 revenue up 31% YoY to $562M, vs. $544.6M est., and forecasts Q4 revenue of $589M, vs. $580M est.; NET jumps 9%+ after hours (Reinhardt Krause/Investor's Business ...)
value.content:
Reinhardt Krause / Investor's Business Daily:
Cloudflare reports Q3 revenue up 31% YoY to $562M, vs. $544.6M est., and forecasts Q4 revenue of $589M, vs. $580M est.; NET jumps 9%+ after hours  —  Cloudflare (NET) reported third-quarter earnings and revenue that topped estimates.  The internet firm's sales guidance came in above expectations.

value.title: Twilio reports Q3 revenue up 15% YoY to $1.3B vs. $1.25B est., forecasts Q4 sales above est., agrees to buy identity platform Stytch; TWLO jumps 8%+ after hours (Chris Ciaccia/Seeking Alpha)
value.content:
Chris Ciaccia / Seeking Alpha:
Twilio reports Q3 revenue up 15% YoY to $1.3B vs. $1.25B est., forecasts Q4 sales above est., agrees to buy identity platform Stytch; TWLO jumps 8%+ after hours  —  For the period ending Sept. 30, Twilio said it earned an adjusted $1.25 per share as revenue rose  —  Quick Insights

value.title: OpenAI starts to sell extra credits for Sora, which currently has a limit of 30 free gens per day; 10 video gens will retail for $4 through Apple's App Store (Anna Washenko/Engadget)
value.content:
Anna Washenko / Engadget:
OpenAI starts to sell extra credits for Sora, which currently has a limit of 30 free gens per day; 10 video gens will retail for $4 through Apple's App Store  —  Expect more monetization moves from the company soon.  —  OpenAI has started selling power users extra credits for its Sora AI video generation tool.

value.title: Amazon reports a $9.5B pre-tax gain from its investment in Anthropic, which was included in the company's non-operating income for Q3 (Todd Bishop/GeekWire)
value.content:
Todd Bishop / GeekWire:
Amazon reports a $9.5B pre-tax gain from its investment in Anthropic, which was included in the company's non-operating income for Q3  —  In-depth Amazon coverage from the tech giant's hometown, including e-commerce, AWS, Amazon Prime, Alexa, logistics, devices, and more.  —  Video

value.title: Amazon reports Q3 AWS revenue up 20% YoY to $33B, vs. $32.42B est., and AWS operating income up 9.5% YoY to $11.4B (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
value.content:
Annie Palmer / CNBC:
Amazon reports Q3 AWS revenue up 20% YoY to $33B, vs. $32.42B est., and AWS operating income up 9.5% YoY to $11.4B  —  Amazon said Thursday that revenue in its cloud computing business increased 20% in the third quarter, exceeding analysts' estimates.  —  Revenue at Amazon Web Services for the third quarter totaled $33 billion.

value.title: Apple expects Q1 revenue to grow 10% to 12% YoY, with iPhone sales up by double digits, and reports Q4 China revenue down 4% YoY to $14.5B, vs. $16.24B est. (Stephen Nellis/Reuters)
value.content:
Stephen Nellis / Reuters:
Apple expects Q1 revenue to grow 10% to 12% YoY, with iPhone sales up by double digits, and reports Q4 China revenue down 4% YoY to $14.5B, vs. $16.24B est.  —  - Apple's fiscal first quarter revenue sales forecast above expecations  — Supply constraints and China delays impact fiscal fourth quarter
